00061     public function afterFind( $oEvent )
00062     {
00063 //      CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'afterFind event raised' );
00064 
00065         //  Get fresh values
00066         $this->m_arLastAttributes = $oEvent->sender->getAttributes();
00067         $this->m_bIsDirty = false;
00068         
00069         //  Let parents have a go...
00070         return parent::afterFind( $oEvent );
00071     }

00097     public function revert()
00098     {
00099         $this->owner->setAttributes( $this->m_arLastAttributes );
00100     }
00101 
00107     public function getChangedSet( $arAttributes = array(), $bReturnChanges = false )
00108     {
00109         $_arOut = array();
00110 
00111         if ( $this->m_bIsDirty )
00112         {       
00113             foreach ( $this->m_arLastAttributes as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00114             {
00115                 //  Only return asked for attributes
00116                 if ( ! empty( $arAttributes ) && ! in_array( $_sKey, $arAttributes ) )
00117                     continue;
00118                     
00119                 //  This value changed...
00120                 if ( $_arTemp = $this->checkAttributeChange( $_sKey, $bReturnChanges ) )
00121                     $_arOut = array_merge( $_arOut, $_arTemp );
00122             }
00123         }
00124     
00125         return $_arOut;
00126     }
00127     
00135     public function didChange( $oAttributes )
00136     {
00137         if ( ! $this->m_bIsDirty )
00138         {
00139             $_arCheck = $oAttributes;
00140             if ( ! is_array( $_arCheck ) ) $_arCheck = array( $_arCheck );
00141 
00142             foreach ( $_arCheck as $_sKey => $_oValue )
00143             {
00144                 if ( $this->checkAttributeChange( $_sKey ) )
00145                 {
00146                     $this->m_bIsDirty = true;
00147                     break;
00148                 }
00149             }
00150         }
00151             
00152         //  Return
00153         return $this->m_bIsDirty;
00154     }
00155 
00156     //********************************************************************************
00157     //* Private Methods
00158     //********************************************************************************
00159     
00166     protected function checkAttributeChange( $sAttribute, $bReturnChanges = false, $bQuickCheck = false )
00167     {
00168         $_arOut = array();
00169         $_bChanged = false;
00170         $_arSchema = ( $this->owner instanceof CPSModel ) ? $this->owner->getSchema() : $this->owner->getMetaData()->columns;
00171 
00172         //  Get old and new values
00173         $_oNewValue = CPSHelperBase::nvl( $this->owner->getAttribute( $sAttribute ), 'NULL' );
00174         $_oOldValue = CPSHelperBase::nvl( $this->getLastAttribute( $sAttribute ), 'NULL' );
00175 
00176         //  Make dates look the same for string comparison
00177         if ( isset( $_arSchema[ $sAttribute ] ) && ( $_arSchema[ $sAttribute ]->dbType == 'date' || $_arSchema[ $sAttribute ]->dbType == 'datetime' ) )
00178             $_bChanged = ( strtotime( $_oOldValue ) != strtotime( $_oNewValue ) );
00179         else
00180             $_bChanged = ( $this->m_bCaseInsensitive ) ? ( 0 != strcasecmp( $_oOldValue, $_oNewValue ) ) : ( 0 != strcmp( $_sOldValue, $_sNewValue ) );
00181 
00182         //  Record the change...
00183         if ( $_bChanged ) 
00184         {
00185             //  Set our global dirty flag
00186             if ( ! $this->m_bIsDirty ) $this->m_bIsDirty = true;
00187             
00188             //  Just wanna know?
00189             if ( $bQuickCheck ) return true;
00190                 
00191             //  Store info
00192             $_arOut[ $sAttribute ] = $bReturnChanges ? array( $_oOldValue, $_oNewValue ) : $_oOldValue;
00193         }
00194         
00195         //  Return
00196         return empty( $_arOut ) ? ( $bQuickCheck ? false : null ) : $_arOut;
00197     }
